sect1.title: Internal Component Design
sect1.para:
The ORU_SafetyGuard_QM component is splitted into the following SW units:
ORU_SafetyGuard_QM_Task.c - This module contains all client server interfaces needed by ORU Guard
ORU_SafetyGuard_QM_Task.h - Header file for ORU_SafetyGuard_QM_Task.c
ORUGUARD1_IF_RtePatch.h - Rte patch header file of the SWC ORUGUARD1_IF.

sect1.title: Requirements Allocation
sect1.para:
For more details please see Requirements Implementation chapter. Note: Start, Stop and RequestResults functions for routines 0360 and 035f implements the same requirement as only routine name is mentioned in them. Read and ConditionCheckRead functions for data 1034, 1036, 1044, 1045, 1046 and 1047 implements the same requirement as only data name is mentioned in them. Non functional requirements are traced here:
Requirement ID
Action
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_249
The integration shall provide an AUTOSAR port StOruGuard1Diag to receive diagnostic data from ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_276
The integration shall provide an AUTOSAR port StOruGuard1Nvm to receive signals regarding data to be stored non volatile from ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_277
The integration shall provide an AUTOSAR port StOruGuard1Dem to receive signals for diagnostic event management (error reporting) from ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_278
The integration shall provide an AUTOSAR port StOruGuard1 to receive information from ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_279
The integration shall consume an AUTOSAR port StDiagOruGuard1 to provide diagnostic data to ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_280
The integration shall consume an AUTOSAR port StNvmOruGuard1 to provide NVM status information to ORU_GUARD1.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_284
The NVM data and status shall be accessible by ORU_GUARD1_IF with the following client/server interfaces: Rte_Call_NvmBlock_ReadBlock,
Rte_Call_NvmBlock_WriteBlock and Rte_Call_NvmBlock_GetErrorStatus.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_160
The status of DTC "0x86F07B - Online Remote Update - Softwareversionen inkonsistent" shall be accessible by ORU_GUARD1_IF with the following
client/server interfaces: Rte_Call_SwInconsistentInfo_GetEventStatus and Rte_Call_SwInconsistentMonitor_SetEventStatus
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_289
The following client/server interface shall be used to inform ORU_GUARD1_IF about a status change of DTC "0x86F07B - Online Remote Update
- Softwareversionen inkonsistent": ORUG1IF_SwInconsistentCallback.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_161
The status of DTC "0x86F07C - Online Remote Update - Softwareversionen inkonsistent - Fahrzeug stillgelegt" shall be accessible by ORU_GUARD1_IF
with the following client/server interfaces: Rte_Call_VehLockedInfo_GetEventStatus and Rte_Call_VehLockedMonitor_SetEventStatus.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_290
The following client/server interface shall be used to inform ORU_GUARD1_IF about a status change of DTC "0x86F07C - Online Remote Update
- Softwareversionen inkonsistent - Fahrzeug stillgelegt": ORUG1IF_VehLockedCallback.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_154
0x1005 - Status ORUGuard1 G1_Info. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1005:
ORUG1IF_Info_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_Info_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_155
0x1044 - Status Metadaten ORUGuard1 G1_MetaDataState. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1044:
ORUG1IF_MetaData_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_MetaData_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_156
0x1045 - Zustand ORUGuard1 G1_State. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1045:
ORUG1IF_State_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_State_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_157
0x1034 - Sperrzustand ORUGuard1 G1_FixationState. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1034:
ORUG1IF_FixState_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_FixState_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_158
0x1036 - Zielsteuerger√§te-Informationen G1_ECUData. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1036:
ORUG1IF_TargetInfo_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_TargetInfo_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_159
0x1046 - Kampagnenergebnisse G1_ECUDataSummary. The following functions shall be called by DCM to read the data of MW 0x1046:
ORUG1IF_CampaignResults_ConditionCheckRead and ORUG1IF_CampaignResults_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_299
0x035F - Online Remote Update Zusatzinformationen. The following functions shall be called by DCM to start and stop routine 0x035F
and to request results of routine 0x035F: ORUG1IF_ECUMetaData_Start and ORUG1IF_ECUMetaData_Stop.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_300
0x0360 - Online Remote Update Entsperrung Guard. he following functions shall be called by DCM to start and stop routine 0x0360
and to request results of routine 0x0360: ORUG1IF_UnlockGuard_Start and ORUG1IF_UnlockGuard_Stop.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_288
Generated random numbers shall be accessible by ORU_GUARD1_IF with the following client/server interface:
Rte_Call_CsmRandomGenerate_RandomGenerateSync.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_149
For integration a RAM consumption of the ORU_GUARD1IF library of 200 Bytes shall be considered.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_151
For integration a ROM consumption of the ORU_GUARD1IF library of 10000 Bytes shall be considered.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_345
The ORUGUARD1 NVM block shall be restored at startup.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_347
The configured ORUGUARD1 PIM block shall be stored in NVM when the write request by ORUGUARD1 is received.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_321
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_Init.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_322
For integration a stack usage of 128 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_Task.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_326
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_Info_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_327
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_CampaignResults_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_328
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_CampaignResults_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_323
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_VehLockedCallback.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_324
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_SwInconsistentCallback.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_325
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_Info_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_329
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_FixState_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_330
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_FixState_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_334
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_State_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_331
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_MetaData_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_333
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_State_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_336
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_TargetInfo_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_152
For integrantion an ORUGUARD1 NVM block shall be configured as redundant block storage with error correction.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_342
For integration a stack usage of 128 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_UnlockGuard_RequestResults.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_339
For integration a stack usage of 128 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_ECUMetaData_RequestResults.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_335
For integration a stack usage of 48 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_TargetInfo_ConditionCheckRead.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_341
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_UnlockGuard_Stop.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_337
For integration a stack usage of 128 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_ECUMetaData_Start.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_332
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_MetaData_ReadData.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_340
For integration a stack usage of 128 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_UnlockGuard_Start.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_346
A number of 720 write cycles per year shall be considered for the ORUGUARD1 NVM block.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_338
For integration a stack usage of 64 Bytes shall be considered for runnable ORUGUARD1_IF_ECUMetaData_Stop.
SWR_ICAS1_L3_ORU_SG_153
The ORUGUARD1 NVM block shall be able to store 64 Byte of data.

sect1.title: Software Unit Interfaces
sect1.para: We have no interfaces between units because there is just one unit in ORU_SafetyGuard_QM.

sect1.title: Dynamic Behavior
sect1.para: ORU_SafetyGuard_QM SWC dynamic behavior is described in SWA: VW_ICAS1/Chorus_6M/All_Cores/SoftwareDecomposition/ApplicationLayer/ORU_SafetyGuard/ORU_SafetyGuard_QM/SW Architecture/Dynamic

ORU_SafetyGuard_QM SWC is assigned to CORE 0 , in SWA: VW_ICAS1/Chorus_6M/All_Cores/SoftwareDecomposition/ApplicationLayer_Core0. ORU_SafetyGuard_QM component execution is under control of Scheduler (CDD) in task: SchM_ICAS1_Main_C0 in SWA: VW_ICAS1/Chorus_6M/All_Cores/SoftwareDecomposition/ApplicationLayer/ORU_SafetyGuard/ORU_SafetyGuard_QM/SW Architecture/Dynamic/Lifecycle
No interrupt needs to be configured for by the module.
No AUTOSAR OS/OSEK event needs to be configured for by the module.
Not applicable because ORU_SafetyGuard_QM doesn't require a special power mode.

In case any pointer parameters are NULL, return RTE_E_INVALID. When function is called with NULL PTR, E_NOT_OK returned. When function is called with NULL PTR, UDScub_GENERAL_PROGRAMMING_FAILURE returned. If the data's range is not in boundaries, UDScub_REQUEST_OUT_OF_RANGE returned. If writing process is not succeeded, UDScub_GENERAL_REJECTED returned.
Since ORU_SafetyGuard_QM is designed to run on a single core, concurent access of the component is not required.
No complex macros or function like macros used. Following macros are used: Macros section.
ORU_SafetyGuard_QM doesn't make use of or implements a particular algorithm.
ORU_SafetyGuard_QM doesn't use complex data structures. In such cases, descriptions are given at the coresponding function that uses them.

entry.para: No algorithms and interaction is rated low.
Number of units lower then 3 and static code only.
